I'm seeing a lot of flawed math in this thread. 

You buy one randuins omen. Crits now deal 10% less damage. THis means a crit of 200% damage now deals 180% damage (200x0.9). Two randuins make it deal 162% damage (180x0.9).
Zero Randuins: 200.0%
One: 180.0%
Two: 162.0%
Three: 145.8%
Four: 131.2%
Five: 118.1%
Six: 106.3%

Against Infinity edge crits:
Zero Randuins: 250.0%
One: 225.0%
Two: 202.5%
Three: 182.3%
Four: 164.0%
Five: 147.6%
Six: 132.9%

Rounded to one decimal, typos are possible.

Sooo, you build 6 Randuin's and make the carry buy Last Whisper. Current last whisper will take off 120 bonus armor, another 24 armor (assuming  80 base). You're now left with, lets' say 5k health (maybe) 176 armor, and zero damage items.

I can't say I'm liking how this looks for you. Like, at all. And that's not even taking into account that you better pray that the enemy carry isn't Vayne, or that they don't have a %health magic damage dealer like Tahm, Gnar, or even Ekko.

Like, go for it if you have a real hate-on for the enemy Yasuo or whatever, but it doesn't look great from here.
